title: Dungeon CEO
synopsis: A manager reincarnates as the mind behind a dungeon—now quarterly goals include not getting slain.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: Onboarding
chapters.content_md:
## Onboarding

I woke up inside a dashboard. Not a car dashboard—the kind with sliders for lava flow and levers labeled *Minion Attrition*...

The first KPI blinked: **Survive day one.**

chapters.title: Chapter 2: KPIs
chapters.content_md: ## KPIs\n\nIt turns out adventurers are a churn problem. I add a new metric: **Hero Deterrence Rate**. The goblins cheer; the finance goblin does not.
